actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational
actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise certain provisions relating to audits of vocational institutions.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that financial and compliance audits of vocational institutions must be made at least once every two years, rather than annually.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise certain provisions relating to audits of vocational institutions.
